summary:
This mod add several selfmade lanterns in the following places:

- Dawnstar
- Falkreath
- Markarth
- Morthal
- Riften
- Riverwood
- Solitude
- Whiterun
- Windhelm
- Winterhold
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=7]Welcome to[/size]
[img]http://s9.postimage.org/st1oqntzz/titolo.jpg[/img]
[youtube]0OgDlXN-dsQ[/youtube][youtube]BO9y5WsC7GY[/youtube][youtube]u_I_bdOm57U[/youtube][youtube]5zQ10D8Swvk[/youtube]
[youtube]ZzjdDi1Nseo[/youtube][youtube]huSPTE7AOaM[/youtube]
[img]http://s9.postimage.org/cklgh6l5r/2012_12_05_00010.jpg[/img]
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/kr2gz2sk5/2012_12_05_00011.jpg[/img]

[size=5]SKYRIM 1.8 REQUIRED[/size]
[/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod add several selfmade lanterns in the following places:

- Dawnstar
- Falkreath
- Markarth
- Morthal
- Riften
- Riverwood
- Solitude
- Whiterun
- Windhelm
- Winterhold

* COMPATIBILITY *
Should be compatible with any mod, however I don\'t know about \"Open Cities\". Please try it and tell me about that.

* PERSONAL CONSIDERATIONS *
Since this mod is SURELY not lore-friendly, I\'m try to respecting the lore. How? Markarth is poorly decorated because is fighting against Forsworn. Windhelm have just the Christmas tree because is opposing the Empire.

* INSTALL *
Unpack, activate it by the Menu Launcher and enjoy!

* UNINSTALL *
Just delete the ESP and BSA

* FACEBOOK *
Join me on facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods

* BUGS *
Please report to me any bugs
author: MannyGT
